# anchor

**Instance Property**

The anchor representing the detected surface, if any.

## Declaration

```swift
var anchor: ARAnchor? { get }
```

## Discussion

Results of the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARHitTestResult/ResultType/featurePoint] type do not include an anchor.

## Identifying Results

- **type**: The kind of detected feature the search result represents.
- **ARHitTestResult.ResultType**: Possible types for specifying a hit-test search, or for the result of a hit-test search.
